page.title: 08LIFE IN BROMPTON
page.content: The average home is very comfortably furnished and has many labour saving devices e.g.vacuum cleaner,washing machine,fridge/freezer,toaster,food mixer & some have dish washers. Kitchens have fitted cupboards and units.During working days most families have breakfast and leave home as follows;Dad before 8_00a.m., children about 8_30.Some mothers have full or part_time jobs.At weekends Sunday lunch is still a tradition with roast beef & Yorkshire puddings etc. Very few families attend church or chapel.Clothes tend to be based on American fashion ie.jeans,sweaters, training shoes.Formal dress is only used for special occasions.Leisure time within the home tends to be spent watching TV or some new Technological invention eg. home computer,or pursuing a hobby.
